title: How to Draw a Cute Kawaii Face (Girl)

steps.headline: Start by drawing two little oval (vertical) eyes.
steps.description: Make sure they are at least one centimeter apart from each other.

steps.headline: Draw a little mouth beneath the eyes next.
steps.description: The mouth shouldn't be far from the eyes.

steps.headline: Add some little freckles/dimples/spots.
steps.description: Add three little dots on both sides of the mouth.

steps.headline: Draw eyelashes on top of the eyes.
steps.description: Add 3. Make them a little short.

steps.headline: Add a final touch.
steps.description: Go up about a centimeter above the eyes, and to the left draw a little bow.

text: Start by drawing two little oval (vertical) eyes. Make sure they are at least one centimeter apart from each other. Draw a little mouth beneath the eyes next. The mouth shouldn't be far from the eyes. Add some little freckles/dimples/spots. Add three little dots on both sides of the mouth. Draw eyelashes on top of the eyes. Add 3. Make them a little short. Add a final touch. Go up about a centimeter above the eyes, and to the left draw a little bow.
sentences: Start by drawing two little oval (vertical) eyes.
Make sure they are at least one centimeter apart from each other.
Draw a little mouth beneath the eyes next.
The mouth shouldn't be far from the eyes.
Add three little dots on both sides of the mouth.
Draw eyelashes on top of the eyes.
Go up about a centimeter above the eyes, and to the left draw a little bow.
